name: Warfleet Star Command
description:
You are the bridge captain of the imperial star fleet "Genesis". While traveling through hyperspace, your sensors pick up a single unidentified signal. Undoubtedly, the enemy. Prepare your highly-esteemed fleet for combat, captain!

Only controls are click to select, and click again to order a ship to move. Their subspace leap drives will take them to the destination instantaneously. Once you're prepared, press space to skip to combat. If you're unhappy with your fleet's performance for any reason, Escape, Enter, and the R key will help you reconsider your strategy.

Unfortunately, no good control scheme for controllers, however I have made some progress, and this game is *playable* with a trackpad!
